actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to provide for the repatriation of the remains of five unknown members of the United States Navy killed and interred in Tripoli in 1804 and for the interment of such remains at the United States Naval Academy or the Arlington National Cemetery.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Navy to repatriate the remains of five unknown American sailors from Tripoli, Libya. Authorizes the Secretary to inter such remains at the United States Naval Academy or at Arlington National Cemetery.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the repatriation of the remains of five unknown members of the United States Navy killed and interred in Tripoli in 1804 and for the interment of such remains at the United States Naval Academy or the Arlington National Cemetery.
